alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 21 at 6:07PM MST until August 21 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 700 PM MST. * At 607 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Paradise Valley to Granite Reef Dam, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Chandler, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Apache Junction, Paradise Valley, Laveen, East Mesa, Sun Lakes, Queen Creek, Tempe Marketplace, Piestewa Peak Park and Salt River Indian Community. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 140 and 175. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 206. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 8. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
